primes

Class BSmooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • primes.BSmooth

  • public class BSmooth
extends Object
    Class holds B-smooth static methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BSmooth() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isBSmooth(BigInteger N, BigInteger B)
      Tests if the integer N is B-smooth, for integer B.
      That is, all prime factors of N are less than B.
      static BigDecimal L(BigInteger X)
      Calculates the function L(X) of a BigInteger X.
      static BigInteger psi(BigInteger N, BigInteger B)
      Returns the number of B-smooth integers in range (1, N] for BigInteger N.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isBSmooth

        public static boolean isBSmooth(BigInteger N,
                                BigInteger B)
        Tests if the integer N is B-smooth, for integer B.
        That is, all prime factors of N are less than B.
        Parameters:
        N -
        B -
        Returns:
        true if N is B smooth, false otherwise.

      • psi

        public static BigInteger psi(BigInteger N,
                             BigInteger B)
        Returns the number of B-smooth integers in range (1, N] for BigInteger N.
        Parameters:
        N -
        B -
        Returns:
        the number of B smooth integers in the range.

      • L

        public static BigDecimal L(BigInteger X)
        Calculates the function L(X) of a BigInteger X. L(X) defined as exp(sqrt(ln(x) * ln(ln(x))).
        An Introduction to Mathematical Cryptography page 147.
        Parameters:
        X -
        Returns:
        L(X)
